Test.name: Integer
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with an attribute of type int.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Boolean
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with an attribute of type boolean.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Long
Test.HowWorkTest:
It includes a concept with an attribute of type boolean.
NOTE: This test uses the same content as the Date-attribute test.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Float
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with an attribute of type float.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Double
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with an attribute of type double.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Date
Test.HowWorkTest:
It includes a concept with an attribute of type date.
NOTE: This test uses the same content as the Long-attribute test
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Byte Sequence
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with an attribute of type byte-sequence.
Test.WhenTestPass:
Test passed if no exception is fired.
NOTE: When using the SL language this test is PASSED if the above operation fails

Test.name: Agent Action
Test.HowWorkTest: It sends an AgentAction content.
Test.WhenTestPass:
Test passed if no exception is fired.
NOTE: When using the SL language this test is PASSED if the above operation fails

Test.name: Agent Action1
Test.HowWorkTest: It sends an AgentAction content with BasicOntology.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Agent Action2
Test.HowWorkTest: It send a Concept that represents an action but is not an AgentAction within a BasicOntology.ACTION
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Object
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with a slot as generic object.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Unknown Schema
Test.HowWorkTest: It inserts a content that is a Predicate of an unknown type.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if exception is fired.

Test.name: Onto AID
Test.HowWorkTest: Test the usage of an OntoAID where a Concept is required.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Sequence
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with an aggregate attribute of type SEQUENCE.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Missing Optional
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with a missing optional attribute.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Missing Manadatory
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with a missing mandatory attribute.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Content Element List
Test.HowWorkTest: It composes the content with more than one content element, i.e. a content element list.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Aggregate as Concept
Test.HowWorkTest: It inserts an aggregate where a concept is required.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Typed Aggregate
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a typed aggregate containing an element of a wrong type.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if an exception is fired.

Test.name: Cardinality
Test.HowWorkTest:
It includes with an aggregate including a wrong number of elements.
NOTE: This also tests adding a facet in a class for a slot defined in a superclass.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Correct IRE
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a correct IRE.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Onto ACLMessage
Test.HowWorkTest: It uses an OntoACLMessage where an AgentAction is required.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: BC Reflective Introspector
Test.HowWorkTest: It includes a concept with an attribute of type sequence using the Backward compatible Reflective Introspector.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Abs Descriptor As Concept
Test.WhatTest: Tests the usage of AbsConcept as a Java class associated to a Concept in an ontology.
Test.HowWorkTest: The content used in this test is a predicate represented as a Java object including a concept represented as an instance of the AbsConcept class.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Abs Descriptor As Predicate
Test.HowWorkTest: It uses an AbsPredicate as a Java class associated to a Predicate in an ontology.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Slot Order
Test.HowWorkTest: It including a predicate where slots values have been set in a mixed order.
Test.WhenTestPass: Test passed if no exception is fired.
